name: panel-boss
description: Be the boss of your (i)DE - resize any panel to any size at any time
author: Tuomas Hatakka

grid.title: Grid size
grid.description: Set the size for the snapping grid (clear to disable snapping)

handlesAlwaysVisible.title: Handles always visible
handlesAlwaysVisible.description: If true, resize and drag handles are always shown on panel hover. If false, the handles are displayede only when the edit mode is active

panelDefaultSize.title: Panel default size
panelDefaultSize.description: The width/height for panels to adopt when dropped if they have not been dragged.
